thread.title: Shreveport dog park gets closer to being built
thread.title_full: Shreveport dog park gets closer to being built - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Shreveport dog park gets closer to being built
text:
SHREVEPORT, La. (AP) - A dog park is getting closer to opening in Shreveport.
The Times reports ( http://bit.ly/1PfAFMC ) that designs for the park were shown to the public last week.
Officials are planning to have the five-acre dog park open by next summer. The park will be built inside Stoner Park.
The park's plans call for a dog pond, tunnels, pavilion, entrance plaza and dog memorial.
The park was designed on a $26,000 budget finalized in September 2014. Then the Shreveport Dog Park Alliance also was given $280,000 from the Red River Waterway Commission for the park's construction.
Information from: The Times, http://www.shreveporttimes.com
